Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and look for feedback on prop ideas from @LevelDesigner.
Collect environment asset references that complement the game setting by exploring various environments in games and art resources.
Organize and categorize the environment asset references into thematic folders.
Conduct a meeting with @SystemsDesigner and @UI/UXDesigner to discuss how props will interact with the game systems and UI.
Implement notes and feedback from the meeting into the prop design documentation.
Take a break, browse game design forums for any new ideas or inspiration.
Review the progress made on character movement and props, and prepare updates for the team.
